item.title: Video 1
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ECnMI4Welfw&ab_channel=KorbiSkiing

Prepare for
Liftoff Audi Nines

Snowboard Magazine 10.18.19

With less than one week to go until the 2019 Audi Nines takes over Sölden and Obergurgl-Hochgurgl, Austria, preparations are running full speed ahead.
